full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KLU BDUD KLU GNYAN GDON GROL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SKYABS MGON DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA CHUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS, 'DI YI GZHUNG DU BDAG NYID PADMA DRAG PO STZAL, BRNGAMS PA'I CHA BYAD 'JIGS PAR BSGOMS, ,SPYAN DRANGS BZHUGS GSOL PHYAG MCHOD BYA, ,BSTOD DANG 'DZAB BZLAS TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL, ,KLU BDUD 'DIR YANG SPYAN DRANGS LA, ,MDOS CHEN 'DI YI BSTIM PAR BYA, , NAD PA'I PHYAG 'TSAL ZHU GSOL GDAB, ,BSHAGS PA BYA ZHING 'GYOD 'TSANG BYA, ,PHYI NA NAS GCOD CING MI BYA DAM BCAS 'BUL, ,SA RIN RDO RIN 'BRU SNA SHOR, ,RNAM 'JOMS GZUNGS CHUS KHRUS BYA SHING, , BYABS BSRUNG PHYIS DANG BSKRAD PA DANG, ,ZHAGS GROL BYA ZHES GSUNG PAS RIGS 'GRES NAS TSAD MA'I SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LAS BSNAN TE BSGRIGS PA'I DGE BA NI GONG MA'I SKYES BU DAM PA'I BSNGO BZHIN 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
